duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and support Dashboards and Data Analytics in a highly transactional Back Office and customer support solution.
Create and manage Dashboards for implementations of various sizes and subject matters.
Proficient in Microsoft Office 365 suite of business software and Microsoft Project.
Experience in Enterprise Business Solutions, specifically SAP projects, and ITIL / ITSM practices and methodologies.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Business Management or Information Systems (Master’s preferred)
